headline: Arizona attorney general, state bar reach diversion deal
sentences: A letter from a bar attorney informing Hobbs of the agreement said it “reflects the parties’ intent to pursue clarity in the Rules of Professional Conduct" but did not indicate whether Brnovich or his aides will have to comply with other terms.

Diversion agreements allow lawyers to have complaints dismissed without sanctions after a period of time if they meet requirements such as training, mentoring, counseling or any other actions negotiated between the lawyers and the bar.
